headline: Dorsey’s Block cutting up to 10% of staff, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Jack Dorsey's fintech Block is considering cutting ​up to 10% of ‌its workforce during annual performance reviews, ‌Bloomberg News reported on Saturday citing people familiar with the matter.  Block didn’t immediately respond to a ⁠request for ‌comment.
